name: URL Detection
description: Works with almost all cases. From: http://someweblog.com/url-regular-expression-javascript-link-shortener/
content:
www.demo.com	http://foo.co.uk/
http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar

www.google.com
http://google.com

http://google.com:80000/asdunasd.html asdnasd

http://www.gg.google.com/?foo=bar
